comment.author: 64496858@N07
comment._content: This is Trinity Baptist Church (there's a sign over the entrance) at Greene and Patchen (see the AGO NYC Organ Project list of pipe organs and churches).

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 26, 2011, ltrupiano suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 90893287@N07
comment._content: I have been looking for a photo of this church everywhere for a school project. I am thrilled to find this!
